channel.title: Mario D. Molina
channel.description: Recent content on Mario D. Molina

item.title: Publications
item.description:
Published Work

  • Molina, Mario D., Mauricio Bucca, & Michael W. Macy (2019), “It is not just how the game is played, it is whether you win or lose”. (Forthcoming at Science Advances).

  • Molina, Mario & Filiz Garip (2019), “Machine learning for sociology”, Annual Review of Sociology, vol. 45. (click here)

Work in Progress

  • Molina, Mario D., Lisha Liu, Hakan Holm, & Victor Nee, “Social norms and spillovers into cooperation with strangers”.

  • Garip, Filiz & Mario D. Molina, “Predictive machine learning models for exploring environment and linkages in historical Mexico-US. flows”.

  • Molina, Mario D., “Resting on your laurels? Status dynamics and individual effort in a large online community”.

  • Drohout, Lucas, Mario D. Molina, & Filiz Garip, “Identity and relational structure among immigrant adolescents in Western Europe”.

  • Asad, Asad, Neil Jr. Lewis, & Mario D. Molina, “Profiles of psychological distress among noncitizens in the United States, 2011-2018”.

  • Molina, Mario D. & Filiz Garip, “Network Amplification”.
